title: Irvo Otieno prosecutor seeks one trial for 10 defendants in his killing
description: The prosecutor in the Irvo Otieno case on Wednesday filed a motion seeking one trial for all 10 people accused in Otieno's killing in Virginiau

title: Teen driver, 3 others seriously injured in head-on crash with school bus
description: Four people, including an unlicensed teen driver, were seriously injured when their car crashed head-on into a school bus in New York state on Wednesday, police said.

title: First pill for fecal transplant wins FDA approval
description: U.S. health officials have approved the first pill that uses healthy bacteria from human waste to fight dangerous gut infections — an easier way of performing so-called fecal transplants

title: House GOP passes bill to raise debt ceiling and cut spending; WH labeled it 'ransom'
description: House Republicans on Wednesday passed the Limit, Save, Grow Act to increase the debt ceiling by $1.5 trillion and cut federal government spending

title: 5 school staffers charged after boy told to eat own vomit
description: Five staff members at a suburban Indianapolis school have been charged with neglect or failure to report neglect after a 7-year-old special education student was told to eat his own vomit in February

title: Fugees rapper Pras found guilty of political conspiracy
description: A Fugees rapper accused in multimillion-dollar political conspiracies spanning two presidencies has been found guilty after a trial that included testimony ranging from actor Leonardo DiCaprio to former U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions

title: WATCH:  This 100-year-old World War II veteran flying a plane on his birthday is pure joy
description: Carl May, who has 13 children, 31 grandchildren, and 40 great-grandchildren, took to the skies in Medford, New Jersey.

title: How Tucker Carlson's exit could financially impact Fox, according to experts
description: The move sent shockwaves not only in Washington D.C. but on Wall Street.

title: Escaped detainee likely dead after shootout
description: One of four detainees who escaped from a Mississippi jail over the weekend is believed to be dead after a shootout with law enforcement Wednesday, authorities said.

title: Haiti police condemn vigilante killings amid gang violence
description: Police are pledging to crack down on unrelenting gang violence that has paralyzed swaths of Haiti’s capital, and are pleading with Haitians to end a string of grisly vigilante killings

title: WATCH:  Seal enjoys a nap while basking in the sun
description: This young elephant seal is adorable while napping in Tasmania.

title: Transgender lawmaker censured by Montana House Republicans
description: Transgender lawmaker Zooey Zephyr has been censured by Montana House Republicans over criticism of gender-affirming care ban.

title: Severe weather, including hail, threatens Texas and Florida
description: Severe storms, including a tornado threat, are forecast for parts of Texas, while a large swath of Florida is under watch for damaging, giant hail.

title: Fox News to turn over more evidence in Smartmatic's $2.7 billion defamation suit
description: Fox News will now turn over additional evidence as part of the ongoing $2.7 billion defamation case it is facing from Smartmatic.

title: House GOP votes on their debt ceiling plan as McCarthy caves on 11th hour compromise
description: House Republicans are set to vote as soon as Wednesday to raise the nation's debt ceiling, after Kevin McCarthy made 11th hour compromises

title: Taliban unaware it killed alleged planner of Kabul airport bombing: US official
description: The official answered continuing questions posed by ABC News.

title: Former Harvard professor sentenced for concealing China ties
description: Former Harvard University professor Charles Lieber was sentenced to time served and a fine for concealing China ties.

title: North Dakota limits bathroom use for transgender people
description: North Dakota's Republican Gov. Doug Burgum has signed a bill that limits access to bathrooms, locker rooms and shower rooms for transgender and gender-nonconforming people in several state facilities

title: Disney sues DeSantis, officials over 'targeted campaign of government retaliation'
description: Disney filed a lawsuit Wednesday against Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis and various Florida officials over a campaign the company alleges was "patently retaliatory."

title: E. Jean Carroll, in testimony, says she can't recall date of alleged Trump attack
description: Testimony begins Wednesday in the civil defamation and battery trial of former President Trump, who is accused of raping writer E. Jean Carroll in the 1990s.

title: Woman accused of assaulting TSA officers at Phoenix airport
description: Authorities say a woman has been arrested for allegedly assaulting three Transportation Security Administration officers at Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport

title: Man killed in petroleum plant blast was also wrestling coach
description: Authorities say a man killed in an explosion at a suburban Chicago petroleum refinery was working at the plant as a contractor and was also a high school wrestling coach

title: Norfolk Southern estimates that Ohio derailment cost $387M
description: Norfolk Southern said it expects February's fiery Ohio derailment to cost it $387 million, but that total will likely increase over time and that doesn't reflect how much the railroad's insurance companies will eventually cover

title: Slain Japanese journalist's camera surfaces after 15 years
description: A video camera that had been missing for more than 15 years after it was dropped by a Japanese journalist who was fatally shot during a street protest in Myanmar has been handed over to his sister at a ceremony in Bangkok

title: Donald Trump needs to be prevented from publicizing evidence, Manhattan DA says
description: The Manhattan district attorney's office has asked the judge overseeing the criminal case against former President Donald Trump.

title: Dozens dead, hundreds missing in Kenya starvation cult case
description: An ongoing investigation into a Christian cult in Kenya whose followers were allegedly told to starve themselves has led to the discovery of dozens of bodies.

title: Melatonin gummies may not contain what they claim, lab analysis shows
description: Nearly 90% of brands were mislabeled, a lab analysis shows.

title: Russian cinemas show Disney movies despite boycott over Ukraine war
description: At a movie theater in central Moscow this month, people had come to watch an illicit film. It was "Avatar: Way of Water."

title: 3 arrested for 1st-degree murder in rock-throwing incidents that killed driver
description: Three suspects have been arrested for allegedly throwing rocks toward at least seven cars on Colorado roads last week, authorities said.

title: Active shooter incidents decreased in 2022, but number of people shot increased: FBI
description: Active shooter incidents decreased in 2022, but number of people shot increased: FBI

title: US announcing new moves to deter North Korea nuclear attack on South Korea
description: The United States on Wednesday will announce steps designed to deter North Korea from launching a nuclear attack on South Korea, according to officials.

title: DeSantis talks trade with South Korean officials
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has held trade talks with South Korean officials in Seoul, on the second leg of his four-nation trip, as the possible rival to Donald Trump seeks to build his diplomatic profile ahead of a widely anticipated presidential campa...

title: China to scrap PCR test requirement for inbound travelers
description: Travelers entering China will no longer need to provide a negative PCR test result starting from Saturday

title: Singapore executes man for coordinating cannabis delivery
description: Singapore has executed a man accused of coordinating a cannabis delivery, despite pleas for clemency and protests that he was convicted on weak evidence

title: WATCH:  Bison calf and herd hold up Yellowstone traffic
description: Traffic in Yellowstone National Park came to a standstill in both directions for a bison calf and a protective herd surrounding it on the road.

title: WATCH:  Sheriff’s deputy saves driver with Heimlich maneuver
description: An Indiana sheriff’s deputy is being lauded for his quick actions after using the Heimlich maneuver to save a choking driver.

title: Authorities find 8 bodies in Mexican resort of Cancun
description: Authorities in the Mexican resort of Cancun say they are trying to identify eight bodies found dumped in the Caribbean resort

title: Biden to visit Japan, Australia for meetings with allies
description: President Joe Biden will visit Japan and Australia next month to huddle with allies on their continued response to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine as well as ways to confront China’s assertive economic and military moves in the Indo-Pacific region

title: McCarthy edges Republicans closer to House debt vote
description: House Republicans are pushing their debt ceiling package toward a vote

title: Ex-New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern to join Harvard
description: Former New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern will be temporarily joining Harvard University later this year
